Summary: Biochemical reaction from hydralazine to 3-methyltriazolophthalazine. This interaction is catalyzed by NAT2.
Biochemical reaction from hydralazine to hydralazine acetone hydrazone.
Biochemical reaction from hydralazine, pyruvate to hydralazine pyruvic acid hydrazone.
